text: Dorothea Douglass defeated Charlotte Sterry 6–2, 6–2 in the All Comers' Final, and then defeated the reigning champion May Sutton 6–3, 9–7 in the Challenge Round to win the Ladies' Singles tennis title at the 1906 Wimbledon Championships.100 Years of Wimbledon by Lance Tingay, Guinness Superlatives Ltd. 1977 ==Draw== ===Challenge round=== ===All Comers' Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== ==External links== * Women's Singles Category:Wimbledon Championship by year – Women's Singles Wimbledon Championships - Singles Wimbledon Championships - Singles
title: 1906 Wimbledon Championships – Women's Singles
